subject: Basketball
College Athletics
Coaches and Managers
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: Bryant University earned the most important victory of its short N.C.A.A. Division I history on Sunday against Boston College, the alma mater of Bryant’s coach, Tim O’Shea.
snippet: Bryant University earned the most important victory of its short N.C.A.A. Division I history on Sunday against Boston College, the alma mater of Bryant’s coach, Tim O’Shea.
